title: Imp. Justiniani Novellae constitutiones, interprete Juliano, patricio ac antecessore urbis Constantinopolitanae... Quibus accesserunt scholia seu notae incerti auctoris in aliquot constitutiones. His subjunximus ipsius etiam Justiniani, Justini junioris,
author: Justinian I, Emperor of the East, 483?-565
